com.xith3d.collider
Interface Force

All Known Implementing Classes:
ForceGravity, ForceVector
public interface Force

Interface used to define how a force acts on a collision node

Originally Coded by David Yazel on Dec 22, 2003 at 11:09:28 PM.

Method Summary
 boolean apply(ColliderNode node, long time, Coord3f velocity)
           
 

Method Detail

apply

public boolean apply(ColliderNode node,
                     long time,
                     Coord3f velocity)
Parameters:
node - The node the force is acting on
time - The time that has passed since the last time this force was applied
Returns:
If false then this force is removed from the node
